attributes.additional_details:
ALL benefits  should be means tested and only the poorest people get them
Child Benefit
Child Tax Credit
Community transport
Concessionary Fares
Disability Living Allowance (Child)
Disability Living Allowance (Your Partner)
Employment and Support Allowance (Income-Based)
Housing Benefit for rates (owner-occupiers)
Housing Benefit for rent and rates (tenants)
Incapacity Benefit
Income Support
Industrial Injuries Disablement Benefit
Jobseeker's Allowance (Income-Based)
winter fuel payment
